name: Aqua Man Adventure
description:
Fancy Underwater Adventure where you got the chance to battle the underwater creatures?

What if you are the adventure on your own, in search of hidden treasure buried deep down beneath the ocean floor?

That's where Aqua Man comes from.
Being famous for his ability to hold long breath underwater, this time he has set his eyes on the Atlantic ocean, in search of hidden treasure.

Help him find his way to the treasure chest.
Download this game now!
Features:
- 3 main characters to choose from
- Tap on the left side to move the ship
- Tap on the right to shoot
- Addictive game play
- Cool and exciting 'shark' theme music
- Coin shop
- Collect coins to unlock next characters

Download this game now!
